instruction: theorem MT_2 [MeasurableSpace Ω] (μ_ : ℕ → Measure Ω) (f : Set Ω → ℝ≥0∞) (h₁ : ∀ n : ℕ, ∀ A : Set Ω, (μ_ n).measureOf A ≤ (μ_ (n + 1)).measureOf A) (h₂ : ∀ A : Set Ω, Tendsto (fun n => (μ_ n).measureOf A) atTop (𝓝 (f A))) : ∃ μ : Measure Ω, μ.measureOf = f := by sorry

initialize.expr: theorem MT_2 [MeasurableSpace Ω] (μ_ : ℕ → Measure Ω) (f : Set Ω → ℝ≥0∞) (h₁ : ∀ n : ℕ, ∀ A : Set Ω, (μ_ n).measureOf A ≤ (μ_ (n + 1)).measureOf A) (h₂ : ∀ A : Set Ω, Tendsto (fun n => (μ_ n).measureOf A) atTop (𝓝 (f A))) : ∃ μ : Measure Ω, μ.measureOf = f := by sorry
